text: "Suddenly I See" is a pop-rock ballad. KT Tunstall sings the song. The song is a strong tribute to female power. The song was released in August of 2005, in the United Kingdom. It was then released in the America a year later. The single performed really high in Australia at the #6 spot. Category:2005 songs Category:Rock songs Category:Pop songs Category:KT Tunstall songs
title: Suddenly I See
